de.japi.components.layout

Class Japi2GridLayout

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.GridLayout
      • de.japi.components.layout.Japi2GridLayout
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.LayoutManager, java.io.Serializable

    public class Japi2GridLayout
extends java.awt.GridLayout
    This class wraps the GridLayout to provide a workaround for a nasty Swing bug: if a panel with the GridLayout is set twice to the same column or row value the component needs to be revalidated. For good measure the method updateParent() is called after every single change on the column or row count so that everything is layed out correctly.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
